arts.ttl: Pochettino faces off against mentor Bielsa when US meets Uruguay in friendly
arts.sum: Mauricio Pochettino gets to match up Tuesday night against Marcelo Bielsa, the coach who recruited him as a 13-year-old, when the United States plays Uruguay in a pre-World Cup friendly. Pochettino, 53, took over the U.S. team last year while the 70-year-old Bielsa became Uruguayâ€™s coach in 2023.
